review: This thing is great. Basically turns your TV into a SmartTV for only $40. Set up is as easy as watching the 3 minute video that comes on when you first plug it in, and the rest is self expanitory.
author: Frank

review: This is pretty good. Easy to set up.
author: Alan Nathan

review: So far, I am very pleased.
author: Connie L.

review: Works great. Love the extension and remote control.
author: Richard L Davis

review: The Amazon Fire Stick is highly convenient, easy to install, and works perfectly.
author: Kevin S Ross

review: I love it!!!! I can watch movies and tv shows on demand. And there's such a variety, including using Netflix!
author: Wanda D. Kendrick "shoe lover"
